title: Meet the retired oil exec plugging forgotten wells to reduce emissions

multiple-choice.question: What is an "orphan well" in the context of oil and gas production?

options.label: A
options.text: A well that has been properly sealed and abandoned

options.label: B
options.text: A well that is still in operation and producing oil or gas

options.label: C
options.text: A well that has been abandoned and not properly sealed, leading to environmental toxins leaking out

options.label: D
options.text: A well that has been plugged but still emits methane
